meanings.sent1: Toponymy helps us understand the history of names.
meanings.sent2: Geographers often use toponymy to learn about different locations.
meanings.sent3: The toponymy class was full of students eager to learn about names.
meanings.sent4: In the world of toponymy, every name tells a story.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of toponymy lies in unraveling the meanings behind names.

meanings.definition: The system of place names in a particular region.
meanings.sent1: The toponymy of this city reflects its diverse cultural influences.
meanings.sent2: Local toponymy plays a crucial role in navigation.
meanings.sent3: The toponymy of the town was so unique that visitors often got lost.
meanings.sent4: The toponymy of the region painted a vivid picture of its history.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the toponymy of a place is like reading a map of its past.

meanings.sent1: Toponymy involves carefully selecting names for new locations.
meanings.sent2: Urban planners use toponymy to assign names to streets and parks.
meanings.sent3: The toponymy of the town was so creative that it became a tourist attraction.
meanings.sent4: The toponymy of the area reflected the community's values and beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The art of toponymy transforms landscapes into meaningful places.
